n: Jicama Salad with Cilantro and Lime
des: "This is a great tasting and fresh salad for summer or anytime.  It goes really well with a Mexican-style dish."
ins: Combine the julienned jicama, chopped cilantro, and salt and pepper in a large bowl. Sprinkle with lime juice and toss to coat. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
